DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether the medication dose was capped.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.:The administration of a maximum dose amount adjusted for a patient based on a given parameter, usually body surface area (BSA), with the goal of reducing drug toxicity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: The administration of a maximum dose amount adjusted for a patient based on a given parameter, usually body surface area (BSA), with the goal of reducing drug toxicity.

Concepts.definition: The administration of a maximum dose amount adjusted for a patient based on a given parameter, usually body surface area (BSA), with the goal of reducing drug toxicity.
